verses.text: Mamin Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, yelxo wal te nib'ab'il a cajnub'.
Manh jantacoc snib'ej in k'ol tzin aj t'a yamaq'uil a cajnub' chi'. Ach Dios pitzan, tzin b'itan t'ayach t'a tzalajk'olal t'a smasanil in k'ool.
Ha nok' tz'unun yet' nok' sanhcapech, tz'ilchaj b'aj tz'aj nok', sb'oan so' nok' b'aj tz'aj yune' t'a slak'anil altar, ach Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, in Reyal ach, in Diosal ach.
Wach' yic heb' cajanek' t'a a cajnub'. Max yactejlaj heb' sb'itan t'ayach.
Te wach' yic heb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool, aton heb' snib'ej spet jawi sk'ual q'uinh, yic sb'at heb' t'a a cajnub' t'a tzalan Sion.
Ayic tzek' heb' t'a lum ch'olan b'aj sq'uib' te' bálsamo, icha sjaj ha' cotac melem tz'ajkan jun ch'olan chi'. Axo b'ab'el nhab' tz'ak'an yaxb'oc lum ch'olan chi'.
Tz'ochnhej stek'anil heb' sik'lab'il, haxo t'a Sion tzach yil heb' ach in Diosal Axonhej Ochi.
Mamin Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, ach sDiosal winhaj Jacob, ab' ko lesal tik.
Ach Dios, ilcot winh ko reyal tzonh tanhwani, aton winh a sik'naquelta. Ak' a wach'k'olal t'a yib'anh winh.

Yelxo wal te wach' tzin aj junok k'ual t'a slak'anil a cajnub', t'a yichanh pax mil k'ual najat ay in eli. In gana to tzin aj in tanhwej spuertail a cajnub' chi' t'a yichanh to tzin aj t'a spat heb' sk'ulan chukal.

Ach Jehová ko Diosal, a ach tzak' sakil k'inal t'ayonh, tzonh a tanhwani. Tzak' a wach'k'olal t'a yib'anh heb' sb'eyb'alan tojolal, tzik'anchaanh heb'. Tzak'nhej masanil tastac wach' t'a heb' yujto ay elk'och t'a sat heb'.
Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a Smasanil, te wach' yic heb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool.
